alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; North Beltrami; Pennington; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:07PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Marshall, western Beltrami and northern Pennington Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mavie, or 12 miles northeast of Thief River Falls, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thief River Falls, Newfolden, Grygla, Goodridge, Holt, Gatzke and Rosewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; North Beltrami; Pennington; West Marshall
